item.title: Taylor Swift’s Coveted Cashmere Sweater Sees a Rare Price Drop for Reformation’s Annual Sale
item.description: The ultimate guide to Ref’s summer savings event, including discounted staples seen on Selena Gomez, Jennifer Aniston, Gabrielle Union and more fashion-forward A-listers.

item.title: Prime Day Is Over — But Apple AirPods Pro 2 Are Still On Sale at Their Best Price Since Black Friday (For Now)
item.description: The new AirPods 4 and AirPods Max, previous models of Apple’s best-selling earbuds and headphones are on sale.
